Actions.name: Microsoft-GetDataPullStatus
Actions.displayname: Waiting for data to appear in the destination

list1: December 2016 update for Microsoft Dynamics 365 (online) or a later instance
You must be a Dynamics 365 Administrator
A valid Azure subscription in the same Azure tenant as the Dynamics 365 instance
The target Azure Database must support the volume of data being replicated from your Dynamics 365 instance
Power BI Pro (to share the template with your organization)
list2: Full cloud solution with minimum set up and maintenance considerations
Data pulled from Dynamics 365 into an Azure SQL Database using the Dynamics 365 Export Service
Connect to Azure SQL and import data into Power BI

Pages.name: $SiteCommon$/pages-gallery/mscrm-login.html
Pages.pricingCost: By deploying the template you authorize the creation of Azure resources in your subscription. The estimated cost for the Azure SQL Database and Azure Key Vault required are approximately $75 per month (this is an estimate only). Note that Azure premium tier Azure SQL Database is recommended during initial data export and can be moved to a less expensive service tier after this step is completed.
